events.text: I understand now, this is all the necromancer's doing…

He has figured out a way to change the game's code by manipulating the binary digits of a computer… This process is slow, but with time, he may be able to remove all the cliches in the game that give you, the player, power.
If you don’t act quickly and defeat the necromancer, and figure out a way to reverse the changes, he might make these changes permanent…
Ok, so what if the game is changed? What can he really alter?
If the necromancer keeps on changing the game, it might become unplayable, which matters because, well, you payed for the game.
Shut up, I don’t care if you did or not, if you lose, the necromancer will delete me out of existence! First, my arms, then, my legs, and then, I won’t even be able to think! So you better fix this!
